title: Kero’s Remarkable Leap: From NFT Artistry to Memecoin Phenomenon
description: In an astonishing display of the power of social media and community engagement, an NFT artist known as Kero has captivated the crypto world by raising over $10 million for a Solana-based memecoin presale in just one day. The feat not only highlights the burgeoning interest in memecoins but also underscores the potential for artists […]

title: $Blur Token Unlocks 33.42 Million Tokens As Vesting Schedule Progresses
description: Recently, a significant amount of 33.42 million $BLUR tokens, valued at approximately $22.3 million, were unlocked from the lockup contract. These tokens are set to be transferred to Coinbase for distribution.  This latest unlock brings the total unlocked $BLUR tokens since June 2023 to 616.8 million, now valued at $411 […]

title: $MEME Token Faces Bearish Trading Week, Drops 10% Today
description: The native token of the web3 venture studio Memeland, $MEME, has encountered a challenging trading week, with a notable decline of 10% in its value today alone. Over the past seven days, the token has experienced a cumulative loss of 2%. Recent on-chain reports shed light on the activity surrounding […]
